properties.name: gmail.mail.username
properties.description: Account username or email address used for SMTP auth.

properties.name: gmail.mail.password
properties.description: Password or app-specific password used for SMTP auth.

properties.name: gmail.mail.properties.mail.smtp.starttls.required
properties.description: Require STARTTLS; fail if not available (mail.smtp.starttls.required).

properties.name: gmail.mail.properties.mail.smtp.ssl.trust
properties.description: Trusted SSL host(s) for SMTP (mail.smtp.ssl.trust). E.g., smtp.gmail.com

properties.name: api.security.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable API security (HMAC authentication).

properties.name: api.security.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key used for HMAC signature generation and validation.

properties.name: api.security.timestamp-tolerance
properties.description: Timestamp tolerance in seconds for request validation (default: 300).

properties.name: api.security.log-security-events
properties.description: Enable logging of security events (authentication attempts, failures, etc.).

properties.name: api.security.detailed-error-messages
properties.description: Enable detailed error messages in API responses (disable in production for security).

properties.name: api.security.public-paths
properties.description: Comma-separated list of public paths that don't require HMAC authentication.
